text: Thomas Patrick "Tom" O'Toole II (May 14, 1913 – July 28, 1983) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Hammond Ciesar All-Americans in one game during the 1940–41 season but did not score a point. == References == Category:1913 births Category:1983 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Hammond Ciesar All-Americans players Category:Sportspeople from Akron, Ohio
title: Tom O'Toole (basketball, born 1913)
